mapper.select: ( SELECT cust_serv_no, cust_serv_title, cust_serv_content, mem_id, cust_serv_date, cust_serv_hits, cust_serv_notice, cust_serv_secret FROM GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD WHERE cust_serv_notice = 1 ORDER BY cust_serv_no DESC ) UNION ALL ( SELECT cust_serv_no, cust_serv_title, cust_serv_content, mem_id, cust_serv_date, cust_serv_hits, cust_serv_notice, cust_serv_secret FROM GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD WHERE cust_serv_notice = 0 ORDER BY cust_serv_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD (cust_serv_title, cust_serv_content, mem_id, cust_serv_notice, cust_serv_secret) VALUES (#{cust_serv_title}, #{cust_serv_content}, #{mem_id}, #{cust_serv_notice}, #{cust_serv_secret})
insert into gogi_serv_image (img_date, img_name, cust_serv_no, reg_id) values(now(), #{img_name}, #{cust_serv_no}, #{reg_id})
mapper.select: select cust_serv_no, cust_serv_title, cust_serv_content,mem_id, cust_serv_date,cust_serv_hits from GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD where cust_serv_no = #{cust_serv_no}
mapper.update: update GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD set cust_serv_hits = cust_serv_hits +1 where cust_serv_no = #{cust_serv_no}
mapper.select: select cust_serv_no, cust_serv_title,mem_id, cust_serv_date from GOGI_CUST_SERV_BOARD where mem_id = #{mem_id} order by cust_serv_date desc

SELECT l.lvl, gc.cust_serv_no, gc.cmt_number, gc.cmt_parent_num, CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', l.lvl - 1), gc.cmt_content) AS cmt_content, gc.cmt_date, gc.mem_id, gc.group_number FROM gogi_comment gc JOIN ( SELECT cmt_number, group_number, lvl FROM gogi_comment WHERE cust_serv_no = #{cust_serv_no} ) l ON gc.cmt_number = l.cmt_number ORDER BY gc.group_number, gc.cmt_parent_num,gc.lvl,gc.cmt_number;
